title: Receptionist, Full or Part Time
description:
class

Surgery Information Job Description
If you enjoy providing great service and working in a team we have just the opportunity for you at Companion Care to start as soon as possible .
What your typical day will look like Your focus is to provide an exceptional service to our clients and the best care possible to their pets providing a link between clients and the clinical team . Your ability to build strong relationships with our clients their pets and the practice team will be critical to your success . Your great client service during a client s visit will make sure that their absolute satisfaction is given and that the client leaves knowing that they have received exceptional service and look forward to their next visit . You will greet each client and offer support guidance and payments and future bookings confidently . the smooth running of the day to day routines of the practice will be done our booking system so computer literacy is a must . This is a full or part time role with part time being a minimum of 30 hours per week .
class

Person Specification
The attributes required You are the friendly and welcoming face for the client and their pets when they arrive at the practice . You are able to provide guidance by keeping yourself fully up to speed with the practice services and any additional services available . You are calm attentive and always focus on the clients needs . You will bring enthusiasm and drive to your role . Your passion for service is with your love of pets . You can deal with everything that is thrown at you from comforting a client who has had some bad news about their pet or in the joy of a new puppy s first visit to the vet . Your personality is infectious and along with your fellow colleagues you create a welcoming and friendly atmosphere in the practice . In short you like to be busy enjoy helping people and their pets and always to make a difference .
class

Benefits
In return we offer such benefits as 20 discount at the Vet Group Pets at Home and the Groom Room access to discounts and in house career development pension and holiday allowance . We are an equal employer . Location

title: Research Fellow (Material Resources)
description: <div> The A Research Institute VARI is part of the Collections Division and conducts facilitates and promotes research across all aspects of the Museum s collections and . The A is a partner to the Business of Fashion Textiles and Technology Creative D Partnership as part of the Creative Cluster funded by the Industrial Strategy by . The Research Fellow role with the A will support the project s Principal Investigator and Co Investigators in the delivery of the project challenge material resources and technical . This challenge on the development of new sustainable from waste materials knowledge from textile and history as well as state of the art research in the field . The Fellow will work in collaboration with A researchers curators and conservators the Principal Investigator industry partners and co Investigators at other institutions the University of Leeds to identify to grow value in the fashion textiles and technology supply chain potential for the use of circular materials and associated critical paths . This role is a fixed term contract with flexibility to work either full time 36 hours per week or part time 27 hours per week date for receipt of applications is 15 March 2021 at midnight . Please note this role is open to both internal and external applicants . For internal applicants are open to variation depending on contractual terms and preference will be given to any employee currently at risk of redundancy . <div>

title: Online Assistant
description:
Assistant 2 Month Fixed Term Contract
Like making people s lives easier Then you ll love our customers orders as one of our Assistants . This is a hands on job where you ll make things happen at pace . Plus you ll be on our all new Winning Team where you can really be the difference . Simply it will be down to you to ensure that every customer order runs as smoothly and easily as possible whether you re working behind the scenes or the products on the shop floor . From the second our shoppers click the order button on our to the moment their shopping is loaded onto our delivery vehicles you ll take pride in the s experiences that really wow our customers making sure they keep back to us . As an Assistant your role could be on the shop floor our customers orders and taking real care in the best quality produce as if you were shopping for yourself . each order together you ll give customers exactly what they ve for . And if ve sold out of anything you ll choose a replacement that s the match to ensure our customers are never disappointed . Or you could take on one of our more general roles getting savvy with the various tech systems we use to make sure all our orders arrive on time and in great condition . ll be speaking to customers over the phone the orders through the tills and even working with our Drivers to load their vans so they re ready to deliver to our customers working and winning as one team . Whichever area you re working in crucially like us you believe in doing the right thing for customers every time . So you ll take plenty of pride in doing these important jobs well . A keen attention to detail and passion for great customer service is really important . ll be open to learning how to operate new technology and comfortable our handsets on the job too . ll also need to be comfortable lifting and moving shopping containers weighing up to . There are lots of great benefits to being on our Winning Team A season ticket loan after you ve completed 12 weeks of service and passed your probation . A discount card after 12 weeks that gives you 10 off your s shopping 10 off at Argos and 25 discount at Habitat . A cycle to work scheme . Special offers on gym memberships restaurants holidays retail vouchers and more .

title: Receptionist
description:
class

re a person with a friendly manner and smart appearance . ve got experience dealing with the general public . Ideally you ll have worked in a care home setting . ve got a good basic education with s or the equivalent and Maths . You also know your way around Office . Customer service is something you really enjoy and you re good at dealing with all sorts of people face to face on the phone or by . re a multi tasker who can work well under pressure and uses initiative . You like the idea of being part of a friendly team working together and to the success of your care home . class

Your role As the first person customers meet when they come to our home your role is vital . ll expect you to welcome visitors in a friendly professional way . ll also make sure the Visitor s Book is completed properly and that the right team member is told of the arrival . ll need a courteous telephone manner and be able to reply promptly to . As well as providing great customer service you ll be responsible for general office such as helping with the payroll . As front of house you ll be a valued member of our team . ll receive excellent support from your colleagues and quality training to progress in your career . As a at Care UK you can look forward to Competitive pay we pay more than the average Fast track career options e . g . into management roles Quality training to develop your skills Flexible hours Bank holiday enhancements Stakeholder pension vouchers Free uniform Thousands of and in store discounts class

title: Customer Assistant
description: <div> <div> Our store teams are at the heart of the local community and our Customer Assistants provide a great service and a buzz people enjoy . s why our customers keep coming back for more . s and fast paced from Market Street to stock to working on our our friendly team love going above and beyond to bring our customers what they want . <div> <div> ll be part of a highly team who work hard and get the job done . Our stores are successful when we all work together to deliver a great experience for our customers and our people make the difference . <div> <div> There are a variety of shift patterns available . re early birds starts are not uncommon and night owls our shops are open late flexibility is really important to us as you will need to be able to work some evenings and weekends . <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> About <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> re interested in hard working people who can work flexibly as part of a team to deliver great customer service every time . In addition to an attractive salary we offer discount cards for you and two friends or family members giving you 10 off your shopping in Morrisons . We also offer company share options a highly competitive pension scheme Life Assurance and more besides . <div> <div> We are an equal employer and welcome applications from all sections of the community . <div> <div> <div> Please note we may close the vacancy early if we receive a high volume of applications . <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> About The Company <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> Shopkeepers for over 100 years we love providing our customers with a great shopping experience they won t find anywhere else . The s supermarket we provide great value for money and good quality fresh food and to over 11 million customers every week . Our focus on freshness makes us stand out as we prepare more fresh food in store than any other supermarket . s . s fast paced . But from Market Street to our friendly team loves going above and beyond to bring our customers what they want . At Morrisons we believe in in our colleagues and industry leading training . We provide our colleagues with the they need to make it to the top . Many of our store managers out on the shop floor . They ve been there and done that . s how they know how to support our colleagues and help our customers so well . <div> <div> <div> <div> <div> <div>

title: Sales Assistant
description: <div> <div> <div> <div> What you ll In our stores you won t just work the tills and stock the shelves . Here at s all about the customer . That means being helpful listening and talking to them no matter how busy you are . In fact you ll be an all round customer service who can understand exactly what each customer wants . That means product knowledge is very important too . Naturally you ll have a great team there to help you . ll need to work together to keep the store well and tidy even when s busy . What s in it for youn Join as a Sales Assistant and you can expect a warm welcome from your team plus the chance to launch a whole new career With stores UK wide there are plenty of to move around . We will reward you with some fantastic flexible benefits up to 50 discount in our High Street stores and access to a range of discounts with other retailers . As well as flexible working vouchers a pension and much more Who re looking for Perhaps surprisingly what you need is bags of retail or customer service experience . re looking for people who have a real desire to learn and to make our customers happy ll need to be a great listener good to talk to and naturally helpful . The rest will come . If you can offer us some flexibility to help us cover peak times such as Back to School all the better In return ll try to be flexible too by offering some part time and weekend jobs family friendly hours and various other arrangements . At if you want to get on ll positively encourage you . As a Sales Assistant there s nothing stopping you becoming a future Store Manager or working in one of our Head Offices About You may know we operate on the high street in rail and bus stations airports hospitals and workplaces . But you may be surprised to learn ve been around since 1792 and have over 14 000 employees across the globe . re continually growing by our customers at the heart of all we do and we grow our people too . title: Customer Service Agent – 6month FTC
description:
Customer Service Agent 6 months As a Barclays Financial Assistance Agent you will be to exceptional customer experience . We focus on customers who are in current and future financial difficulty and work with them to understand their financial situation and look to assess . Based on these financial assessments we create a repayment solution to ensure the customer repays their excess and returns back to sustainable terms in a way that is affordable and manageable for our customers . Barclays is one of the world and most financial institutions with 329 years of success quality and innovation behind us . We offer careers that provide endless opportunity helping millions of in
and thrive and financial and digital solutions that the world now takes for . Opening hours are shifts will be line with opening hours . In the future weekend work may be required . What will you be doing Understanding and customer needs in order to tailor solutions whilst the right outcome for the customer and the bank vulnerable customers are and appropriately Understanding and listening to customer concerns and correctly customer complaints to resolve first time complaint where appropriate Being responsible for correct use of systems to ensure that customers records are accurately and up to date to and understanding the appropriate standards controls and limits of authority through training coaching and appropriate communication What re looking for Previous customer service experience excellent listening skills and the ability to show empathy towards a customer financial situation Demonstrable experience dealing with customers in stressful situations Excellent and literacy skills with the ability to understand the different options available to customers and with strong attention to detail A team player who is able to confidently interact with others but who is also able to work independently Skills that will help you in the role Previous experience of working with customers in potential vulnerable circumstances or financial difficulty Experience working in a contact or call environment Financial Services experience Where will you be working Based in our office which is in the heart of the city . Offering a modern working environment with restaurants bars and gyms just a stone s throw away from the office .
Understanding and identifying customer needs in order to tailor solutions, whilst ensuring the right outcome for the customer and the bank
  • Ensuring vulnerable customers are identified and supported appropriately
  • Understanding and listening to customer concerns and correctly identifying customer complaints to resolve first time ensuring complaint escalation where appropriate
  • Being responsible for correct use of systems to ensure that customers’ records are accurately maintained and up to date
  • Adhering to and understanding the appropriate policies, standards, controls and limits of authority through training, coaching and appropriate communication
  • Previous customer service experience, demonstrating excellent listening skills and the ability to show empathy towards a customer's financial situation
  • Demonstrable experience dealing with challenging customers in stressful situations
  • Excellent numeracy and literacy skills with the ability to understand the different options available to customers and summarise with strong attention to detail
  • A team player who is able to confidently interact with others but who is also able to work independently
  • Previous experience of working with customers in potential vulnerable circumstances or financial difficulty

title: Candidate Administrator
description:
Job Description Candidate Administratorn 22 185 24 258 pan The Candidate Administrator will provide a professional high quality customer service within Our Newham Work . You will manage and direct the flow of telephone within Our Newham Work and to support or signpost to the relevant service the successful candidate must be able to deliver a professional service to residents with a sensitive approachn Ability to deal with efficiently and effectively possess a good standard of IT skills and have the ability to offer an excellent customer service to To co ordinate and manage Our Newham Work clients to complete the registration process correctly assess their immediate needs and direct them to the appropriate service promptly . To collect information to client activity in a systematic and way and submit it to relevant Our Newham Work colleague who are responsible for such information . To apply please refer to the full job descriptionn Date 28 . 2 . Please view Candidate Administrator Additional Informationn The Borough of Newham is a Disability Confident employer . Candidates who declare that they have a disability in accordance with the Equality Act 2010 and meet the essential criteria as in the Job Profile will be guaranteed an interview . Priority consideration on all advertised roles will be given to Borough of Newham . The Borough of Newham is to and the welfare of young people and vulnerable groups and expects staff and volunteers to share this commitment . Please be aware that a Disclosure and Barring Scheme check will be required for any position with access to these groups under the provision of the Rehabilitation of Offenders Act 1974 . In addition the Authority reserves the right to request employees undertake a basic disclosure check Disclosure where required for the role this includes anyone who has access to or information directly from a government or has a account . These posts will be required to have a Basic Disclosure check as per the requirements of Personnel Security Standards Please attach your supporting statement explaining in no more than x2 A4 sides why and how you meet the criteria for this role .
About The Borough of Newham is located only 5 miles east of . It is well positioned with access to all major networks in and the south east . It is well connected by public transport with bus tube and . When the Crossrail service opens it will call at Custom House close to our council offices and also station and from there to central . The City Airport which serves major is located at Royal Dock . Newham has the overall population in the country . It was one of the six host boroughs for the 2012 Summer and contains most of the Park the Stadium . It has a thriving arts quarter with the both the Royal East and Circus Arts offering excellent entertainment for all the family . There is the University of East which has two in Newham one in and another next to the regenerated Royal Dock . It also has a large shopping in which has all the major retailers there .
Newham has a large housing regeneration that will build over 1 000 new council homes by 2022 .
Ability to deal with queries efficiently and effectively, possess a good standard of IT skills and have the ability to offer an excellent customer service to residents
  • To co-ordinate and manage Our Newham Work clients to complete the registration process correctly, assess their immediate needs and direct them to the appropriate service promptly.

title: Warehouse Operative Edinburgh
description:
PART TIME WAREHOUSE OPERATIVE TEMPORARY 1 MONTH CONTRACT
We are UPS the world package delivery company . We are looking for people to work at our as a warehouse operative working part time 05 00 09 the opportunity for overtime . We need people who do not mind working in a busy environment moving and packages for our customers .
We prize speed and accuracy but above all else safety so we require a warehouse operative who can pay careful attention on the job follow instructions precisely and double check his or her work on the go .
The Benefits
Located in we offer an hourly rate of 9 . 53 with an additional 25 shift allowance on hours worked between
Excellent benefits package company pension holiday pay discounts at major retailers e . g . Apple cinemas and attractions e . g . Alton Towers The Eye and many more
Overtime are available
Full industry leading training provided workplace methods and certificated aviation security training in a supportive working environment
You will be employed directly by UPS and not through an agencyn
Casual dress and free on site parkingn
UPS operates a promotion from within policy with all our employees the opportunity to progress within the Company .
About You
You have excellent communication skills .
You are a good team player .
You are flexible friendly and have a can do attitude .
You have the ability to work on own initiative and meet tight deadlines .
You can accurately follow written instructions .
You have a great eye for detail whilst working in a fast paced environment .
About UPS
in 1907 as a messenger company in the United States UPS has grown into a multi billion dollar corporation by clearly on the goal of commerce around the globe . Today UPS is a global company with one of the most recognized and admired brands in the world . We have become the world package delivery company and a leading global provider of specialized transportation and logistics services . Every day we manage the flow of goods funds and information in more than 200 and .
